definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Fig. 5 depicts the Southern Hemisphere midlatitude 300-hPa geopotential height field.
sentences.chinese: 图5给出南半球中纬度300百帕位势高度场。

sentences.english: Results The growth and development speed curve of the fetal cerebral hemisphere diameter is "M" shaped.
sentences.chinese: 结果胎儿大脑半球径线生长发育速度曲线呈“M”形。

sentences.english: The inner mechanism is the difference function of hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 其内在机制源于大脑两半球多种功能优势的差异。

sentences.english: Small catlike predatory mammals of warmer parts of the Old World.
sentences.chinese: 东半球温暖地区的象猫的小型食肉哺乳动物。

sentences.english: Increased the angle you can turn the cockpit camera in the rear hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 增加了坐舱视野在后半球的开阔角度。

sentences.english: Any of various Old World freshwater fishes of the genus Barbus or Puntius and related genera.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: In processing the phonetics of Chinese characters associated with semantics, subjects showed within-hemispheric dominance.
sentences.chinese: 与语义相关联的汉字语音加工表现出半球内优势。

sentences.english: The skull is well domed , showing a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.chinese: 头骨是半球形的，枕骨凸起十分明显。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical effectiveness of hemispherectomy on intractable epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大脑半球切除术治疗顽固性癫痫的临床效果。

sentences.english: The SKA will be built in the southern hemisphere with South Africa and Australia currently vying for the right to host the project.
sentences.chinese: 她又南非与澳大利亚共同组建，目前坐落于南半球。

sentences.english: As you know, the brain has two lobes.
sentences.chinese: 总所周知，大脑有两个脑半球。

sentences.english: It's also during rest that the right hemisphere becomes more dominant, which can lead to creative breakthroughs.
sentences.chinese: 休息时大脑右半球起支配作用，会带来创造性的突破。

sentences.english: The right side of the brain is known as the creative side.
sentences.chinese: 大脑右半球被称为富有创造性的半球。

sentences.english: The right side of the brain is known as the creative side.
sentences.chinese: 大脑右半球被称为富有创造性的半球。

sentences.english: On the left is M97 in the constellation Ursa Major, also known in the northern hemisphere as the Owl Nebula.
sentences.chinese: 左边是M97在大熊座，又称北半球的夜枭星云。

sentences.english: The 34 democratically elected leaders in the Western Hemisphere will attend the three-day summit.
sentences.chinese: 西半球34位民选领导人将出席这次为期三天的会议。

definition: equator (of the earth or astronomical body)
the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
